official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include dental care, eye care, and hearing aids among the items and services for which payment may be made under the supplementary medical insurance program.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide payment for dental care, eye care, and hearing aids under the supplementary medical insurance program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include dental care, eye care, and hearing aids among the items and services for which payment may be made under the supplementary medical insurance program.
